== Stop blisters ==

* Wear double socks
* Wear anti-blister socks
* Lubricate your feet - Vaseline
* Put Talc (keep area dry)
* Cover vulnerable spots (tape, pads)


Link: https://www.verywellfit.com/blisters-begone-seven-strategies-to-prevent-blisters-3432491
